sendReps() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.view.server.VirtualViewDriverSync
Since we are playing a game in local there is no need to send the reps; However in local we can't have asynchronous processes for testing, So we use this method to know when the VirtualViewDriver can actually send an answer message.
